name: Ball-and-bounce
tagline: Its a 3-D animation using openGL and multithreading. User can also control the camera and other functions like zoom in zoom out is also available
body:
### Hi Everyone,
Well this was my one of the first project in beginning of my second semester at IIT Delhi. Its based on OpenGl and Threads. It's written in C++. It can be useful as a starting code for OpenGL basics projects. Feel free to use it!

### Authors and Contributors
Me (@insideaayush) and My Classmate @akashtanwar096 are co-creater of this project. 

### Support or Contact
if you have any problem running this then contact me at aayush.gautam924@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
